name: Another Path (Pre-Alpha)
description:
After playing, please help us by filling the feedback form below, best 5 feedbacks will receive gifts from us!

Pre-alpha Feedback Form

Another Path is a relaxing narrative-based exploration game. This game will bring you to a world that is not so much human and technology has left.

Play as a boy (Evan) and a wolf hybrid (Caleb).

Experience the exploration of a unique jungle environment. Switch between characters to do things that are unique to each character and accompany them on their journey back to where they came from.
